actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Hoar Construction, Inc. of Birmingham, Alabama to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a certain sum to a named Alabama corporation to settle claims filed against the Small Business Administration.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Hoar Construction, Inc. of Birmingham, Alabama to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration.
